text: Nguyễn Bá Cẩn (September 9, 1930 – May 20, 2009) was a South Vietnamese politician who served as Prime Minister of South Vietnam from 5 April 1975 until 28 April 1975; serving under Presidents Nguyễn Văn Thiệu and Trần Văn Hương. Bá Cẩn died on May 20, 2009 in California, United States at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Vietnam
title: Nguyễn Bá Cẩn
